title: Linked accounts?
body:
There seem to be two emails linked to my account, one has my IGN, the other has the actual user I login with.

Thing is, I thought the user was just credentials to login. Is it a separate identity inlaid in my entire account?

If I have two emails on my account, how can I change that?

replies.body:
Your username is tied to your account with your Summoner name as well. You can check to see what email is associated with your account on the [Account Management Page.](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect)

Let me know if you have any questions.
The email linked with my SN is not mentioned. How can I see this association?

The email listed on the account management page is the one associated with your account. I've never heard of an instance where this is not true. It could be a second account or a PBE account that's also tied to your live account.

I've removed the links you posted because they contained very sensitive information. Since this is a pretty sensitive topic, I recommend reaching out to our account specialists in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where they'll be able to clear up this confusion for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
